remarks: Express the property " ` R ` is an extension of ` RR ` ".  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2018.)
statement:
isrrext.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
isrrext.v $e |- D = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( B X. B ) ) $.
isrrext.z $e |- Z = ( ZMod ` R ) $.
isrrext $p |- ( R e. RRExt <-> ( ( R e. NrmRing /\ R e. DivRing ) /\ ( Z e. NrmMod /\ ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) /\ ( R e. CUnifSp /\ ( UnifSt ` R ) = ( metUnif ` D ) ) ) ) $.
